    • EditableList

PUT /nodes/:module

Enable/Disable a node module

Headers

Header Value
Authorization Bearer [token] - if authentication is enabled
Content-type application/json

Arguments

Path Component Description
module The name of the module

The request body must be a JSON string with the following fields:

Field Description
enabled true or false - whether to enable or disable the module

Response

Status Code Reason Response
200 Success A Node Module object. See example response body
400 Bad request An Error response
401 Not authorized none
404 Not found none
Node-RED is a creation of IBM Emerging Technology
